name: SSF7
title: Site-Specific Factor 7
subtitle: Surgical Resection
notes:
**Note 1:**  Record the details of surgical resection here even if previously recorded within the abstract.

**Note 2:**  If the case is clinically diagnosed and no surgical resection is performed, use code 000.

**Note 3:**  Do not record stereotactic radiosurgery as tumor destruction. It should be recorded in the radiation treatment items.
rows: No surgery of primary site; autopsy only

Tumor destruction, NOS 
No specimen sent to pathology

Local excision (biopsy) of tumor, lesion or mass
Specimen sent to pathology

Subtotal resection of tumor, lesion, or mass of brain
(Less than half of lobe involved with tumor)
Specimen sent to pathology

Radical, total, gross resection of tumor, lesion or mass in brain
(Less than half of lobe involved with tumor)

Partial resection of lobe of brain
(Tumor involves more than half of lobe)

Gross total resection of lobe of brain (lobectomy) 
(Tumor involves more than half of lobe)
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown if surgery performed; death certificate only
Not documented in patient record
